title: THIS IS THE J4 THAT INTED IN TYLER 1'S GAME // BAN?

embed.description: chico3530 trolling in Tyler 1's game. - Clipped by xTzMenace

body: The user chico3530, took cleanse and ghost into a game, and purposely ran down bot lane to intentionally feed the opposing ADC.

replies.body: We can't simply take action on player requests for bans and such, but hopefully, he was able and remembered to report that person in the post-game lobby like always.
"Simply can't take action on player request"... Seems different when the request is on the fp of reddit. Either way the guy was banned so great job as always guys :)
Sounds like the system must have done it's job as always ^_^

It doesn't though. It works when 150k+ people are watching, but in any other silver/bronze game where someone ints, it doesn't work. Enemy team is more than happy to take a free win, they don't report. Then our team just leaves lobby instantly, maybe 2 reports go through. But yeah it works as always, no report for inting has ever gave me the successful report screen.
I honestly think he was scared because he knows how bad he is. Knew he'd embarrass himself on stream so instead of trying, and ending up looking like the Flex 3v3 idiot he is, he ints.
